title: Anti-Mask Hysteria in Utah & Trump's Indoor Rally in Nevada | Mychal Denzel Smith
itunes:title: Anti-Mask Hysteria in Utah & Trump's Indoor Rally in Nevada | Mychal Denzel Smith
description:
Trevor covers disregard for COVID-19 health risks in the U.S., Dulce Sloan examines the history of Black hair in America, and Mychal Denzel Smith discusses "Stakes Is High."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
